attributes.action: Encourage or force Supermarkets to empty their shelves of water to send to those in need at this time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of britain can manage on what comes out for their tap for a while and donating bottled water would mean that it ALL helps rather than only part of the money raised going to help and the rest being wasted!

The supermarkets wouldn't miss the money they lossed on the bottled water and they would be far more apreciated by the public!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
